thread.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Coupa Announces Global Event Series: CoupaCONNECT 2015
thread.title_full: CORRECTING and REPLACING Coupa Announces Global Event Series: CoupaCONNECT 2015

author: admin
title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Coupa Announces Global Event Series: CoupaCONNECT 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/17/2015 @ 3:32 PM   Coupa Software 
SAN MATEO, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- In the list of upcoming dates and locations, the twelfth line should read: October – San Mateo, California (instead of October – San Mateo, Canada). The corrected release reads: COUPA ANNOUNCES GLOBAL EVENT SERIES: COUPACONNECT 2015 
Coupa Software, the leader in cloud spend management, today announced upcoming dates and locations for its Fall global event series, CoupaCONNECT 2015. This series brings together industry thought leaders from the procurement, finance, IT and AP sector to participate in roundtable discussions about spend optimization trends and best practices. Featured speakers from companies such as The Hackett Group, Spend Matters, Marketo and Grupo Herdez will focus on real topics facing the spend management sector today. 
The CoupaCONNECT global tour will visit three continents, five countries and 18 cities over a three-month span between September and November. Confirmed dates and locations are below, and full details and speakers for all events are available here: http://get.coupa.com/2015-Coupa-CONNECT-request.html . 
September 23 – Mexico City, MexicoSeptember 25 – Toronto, Canada
